common.speaker: Speaker
common.waitingAlert: The program list has not been opened yet. It will be notified through the Facebook, Twitter, and homepage at the time of opening. 👩‍🏫 👨‍🏫
common.goToBuyTicket: You must purchase a separate ticket to participate this program. Even if you have a conference ticket, you will not be able to participate unless you purchase this ticket.🤓

talkDetail.notRecordable: You can not record and record.

lightningTalk.title: Lighting talk
lightningTalk.desc1: Lightning Talk is a very short presentation lasting only five minutes before closing the conference. You can talk about anything!
lightningTalk.desc1-1: Too heavy burden to do presentation in main session, but want to talk.
lightningTalk.desc1-4: Anything else, you want to talk to other people.
lightningTalk.desc2: All talks must take 5 minutes. (Seriously !! After 5 minutes, staff will take the microphone from you )
lightningTalk.desc3: The proposal of Lightning talks will be open from each conference day 9am. Please talk about your interesting and extraordinary story!!
lightningTalk.alertOpening: You can apply from 9:00 AM on the conference day, and only 10 first-come (+3 standby) talks are available. Take the courage and apply now! 🌩
lightningTalk.desc5: You can see the previous Lighting Talks topic.
lightningTalk.desc6: Now you can see this year's lightning talk!

proposingLightningTalk.title: Proposing Lightning Talk
proposingLightningTalk.desc: Please shout out your fun and hard experience!
proposingLightningTalk.desc-1: If you upload a material or a link, the talk will be confirmed after review by the PyCon Organizing Team.
proposingLightningTalk.desc-2: You only need to upload one of them.
proposingLightningTalk.desc-3: The slide should include a topic and table of contents.
proposingLightningTalk.desc-4: If you are not at lightning talk session on your turn, you lose the chance to talk. Please keep your seat during Lightning Talk! 😀
proposingLightningTalk.desc-5: After 5 minutes, the talk really stops🤐. Consider this and set a volume for your talk.
proposingLightningTalk.desc-6: The uploaded material or link will be displayed in advance. Please upload the final version before Lightning Talk.
proposingLightningTalk.slideUrlDesc: The url where the slide used for the Lightning talk is uploaded. Please enter the link after uploading slide to Google Slide or Slideshare and so on.
proposingLightningTalk.commentDesc: Please leave any comments you would like to share with the PyCon Korea Organizing Team regarding the lightning talk.
proposingLightningTalk.submitAlert: Your Lightning Talk submission is complete. After reviewing the talk materials, Lightning Talk will be confirmed.

openSpaceTalk.title: Open Space
openSpaceTalk.desc1: Open spaces are a way for people to come together to talk about topics, ideas or whatever they want. Any subject that two or more attendees want to talk about is a candidate for an Open Space.
openSpaceTalk.header2: How do I participate in an Open Spaces?
openSpaceTalk.desc2-1: It's pretty easy: just show up :)
openSpaceTalk.desc2-2: During PyCon, there will be an Open Space board somewhere near the registration desk. The board acts as a time table for all the Open Spaces, so you know where and when to go for the Open Spaces you're interested in. If a topic is not listed yet, find an open time slot and add it!
openSpaceTalk.header3: Where and when are the Open Spaces?
openSpaceTalk.desc3: The Open Spaces are in a set of of dedicated rooms(2nd floor) during all two of the conference days (Saturday and Sunday).
openSpaceTalk.header4: How do I host Open Spaces?
openSpaceTalk.desc4: There will be an Sticky Note near the Open Space Board. Just fill in the name and a short description of your Open space, and then pin your note on the Open Space board in the room and time slot you want.

sprint.title: Sprint
sprint.desc1-1: Sprints are intensive development session on an open source project of your choice, in a team environment. It's a time to come together with colleagues, old and new, to share what you've learned and apply it to an open source project. Is this your first time joining in Sprints? No problem! It will be the time that you learn directly from the open source contributors.
sprint.desc1-2: Sprint sessions are not just limited to the projects using Python, all languages are welcome!
sprint.desc2: There are also various sprints this year.🧙‍♀️ 🧙‍♂️

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.desc1-1: Tutorials are educational programs for beginners, or challengers for new era. Tutorial mentors and tutors will guide you to easy way of learning. We recommend tutorials for beginner programmers or Python strangers.
tutorial.desc1-2: When an organization applies to host a tutorial session, additional agreement with PyCon Korea Organizing Team is required.
tutorial.desc2: There are also various tutorials this year.🧙‍♀️ 🧙‍♂️

youngCoder.title: Young Coder
youngCoder.desc1: 파이콘 한국 컨퍼런스 티켓 구매자의 자녀, 조카, 이웃 등을 대상으로 하는 프로그래밍 교육 프로그램입니다.
youngCoder.desc2: 컨퍼런스 당일 토/일 각각 다른 커리큘럼으로 진행됩니다. 상세 내용을 참고해주세요.
youngCoder.desc3-1: 여러분의 부모님, 삼촌, 이모께서 오랜 시간 동안 컴퓨터 앞에 앉아있으시는 이유가 궁금했던 적이 있나요?
youngCoder.desc3-2: 혹은 즐겨하는 게임이나 자주 방문하는 웹사이트, 스마트폰의 애플리케이션이 어떻게 동작하는 지 궁금하지 않으세요?
youngCoder.desc3-3: 초등학교 5학년부터 고등학생까지 소프트웨어란 무엇이고, 어떻게 동작하는 지, 모두가 사랑하는 "파이썬"이라는 언어를 통해 함께 알아봅시다!
youngCoder.desc4-1: 여러분들이 모두 개발자가 될 필요는 없어요. 하지만 오늘날 프로그래밍 언어를 이해하는 것은 영어를 잘하는 것만큼 여러분들을 더 훌륭한 사람으로 만들어줄 수 있답니다.
youngCoder.desc4-2: 또한 프로그래밍을 배운다는 것은 컴퓨터가 어떻게 동작하는지 그리고 IT가 세상을 어떻게 변화시켜나가는 지 이해하게 만들어줍니다.
youngCoder.desc4-3: 영어를 쓰는 사람들의 문화와 삶의 방식을 이해할 수 있게 되는 것처럼요!
youngCoder.desc4-4: 게다가 프로그래밍이라는 것은 상당히 합리적이고 논리적이어서, 이것을 배우면 여러분들에게 어떠한 문제가 닥쳐도 가장 알맞은 해결방법을 더욱 정확하고 빠르게 찾을 수 있는 사고력을 길러준답니다.
youngCoder.desc5-1: 마치 영어를 배우듯 쉽게 배울 수 있는 "파이썬"은 굉장히 강력한 프로그래밍 언어입니다.
youngCoder.desc5-2: 컴퓨터 프로그램 작성, 웹 사이트 및 게임 제작, 과학 및 수학 컴퓨팅 등의 작업에 사용되고 있고, 구글이나 카카오 등의 훌륭한 서비스들이 파이썬으로 만들어지고 있습니다.
youngCoder.desc5-3: 우리가 만나는 몇 시간 동안 이 파이썬을 활용하여 컴퓨터와 대화하는 방법을 배우게 될 것입니다.
youngCoder.desc5-4: 프로그래밍을 전혀 몰라도 상관없어요~ 숫자, 문자, 문자열, 목록 등 파이썬의 간단한 데이터 유형을 배우는 것으로 시작할 것이거든요.
youngCoder.desc5-5: 그래도 긴장은 하셔야 해요. 조건문, 반복문 등 약간 더 어려운 것도 살펴볼 예정이거든요.
youngCoder.desc5-6: 마지막으로, 우리는 웹 사이트 및 간단한 게임을 만들어 보면서 이 세상을 이해할 수 있는 더 넓은 시야를 갖게 될 것입니다.
youngCoder.desc6-1-1: 영코더 프로그램은 기본적으로 점심식사가 제공되지 않습니다.
youngCoder.desc6-1-2: 3시간 이상의 프로그램인 경우 컨퍼런스와 동일하게 12:00 - 13:00 점심시간을 가지게 되며 보호자와 함께 점심식사를 하시고 돌아오시면 됩니다.

openlunch.title: Open Lunch
openlunch.desc1-1: It is a program to eat lunch with PyCon Korea sponsors.
openlunch.desc1-2: There are various stories of PyCon Korea sponsors about from their services to recruitment and development culture. Don't miss the chance to eat delicious lunches, listen to passionate sponsors and ask questions!🍱
openlunch.desc2: 📌The targets and contents of the open lunch is different for each sponsor, and participants who apply in advance can attend. Please refer to the more information each detail page.
